content:
I don't have personal preferences or favorites. however, there are numerous powerful moments in "black is king" featuring collaborations with african artists. the video features appearances from artists such as shatta wale, tiwa savage, yemi alade, burna boy, and more, and each brings their unique talents and perspectives to the project.

one standout moment for many viewers is the appearance of nigerian artist wizkid in the music video for the song "brown skin girl." wizkid's smooth vocals and presence help to anchor the message of self-love and beauty that is central to the song, and his appearance adds to the video's celebration of the diversity and beauty of black people across the globe.
